headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://cdn.sanity.io https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' https://cdn.sanity.io; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; style-src-elem 'self' https://fonts.googleapis.com
